alert.note: Alert for Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 10:32PM MST until February 22 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM MONDAY TO 5 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches valley floors, higher benches from southern Salt Lake and Tooele County south to Utah County. Lesser amounts are possible over northern Salt Lake and Tooele Valleys. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys, Salt Lake Valley and Utah Valley. * WHEN...From 5 AM Monday to 5 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Occasional winter driving conditions can be expected, particularly along the benches. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley
